class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 3 students only. Clinical TBA
course_description: This course involves synthesis of nursing knowledge, skills, and clinical reasoning to provide transitional, procedural care, and case management in the ambulatory setting. Emphasis is on analysis and interpretation of complex information for a defined population of interest.
